Articles.Content:
Atlas Corporation proudly presents our newest VTOL fighter, the Stingray!

Description

Have you ever wanted a plane with a six-pack? Have you ever wanted an aerobatic fighter with an incredibly general and overused name? Have you ever wanted this description to stop being this long? Well, this is the plane for you! The Stingray comes with seven engines! (Disclaimer: 6 of said engines are Junos) The Stingray also comes with:

Insane maneuverability! Now you don't have to wait an hour to do a flip!

Aesthetics! Yeah, she's a pretty one!

No guns! Pacifism, yeah!

Easy flying! Even a toddler could fly this thing! (Warning: Warranty void if you actually try this.)

And more!

Images

http://imgur.com/a/5tSYX

I'll add a download if any of you want to try the Stingray out!

Edited August 5, 2016 by THE NARWHAL
Fixed images
